name: Metal Blast 2277
overview: It's a fantastic visual comic book-style shooter. The year is 2277 and a remote planet was attacked by space invaders wanting to destroy nature and the inhabitants of the planet. Rebels confront robotic aliens. The player will act as one of the resistance leaders who masterfully controls firearms. You will have the opportunity to ride a jeep, fly a scooter, ride a hoverboard, while dealing with crowds of different enemies and their giant bosses. There are 11 levels, each offering its own challenge.
